label: 探題
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: During Kamakura times, the Bakufu opened branch headquarters in Kyoto (1221) and Kyūshū (1293); these deputyships were known as the Rokuhara tandai and the Chinzei tandai, with two officers in charge of each. All four deputies were drawn from the Hōjō family.　[六波羅探題、鎮西探題, 北条]
